usage.cn: 想想自己的错，会忘却别人的过
usage.eng: Forget others' faults by remembering your own.

usage.cn: 施予爱绝无损，保留爱却常有失
usage.eng: You never lose by loving. You always lose by holding back.

usage.cn: 温暖是奢侈的东西，奢侈到需要用很深的寒冷和疼痛才能体现。
usage.eng: Warmness is luxury—which is reflected by deep cold and hurt.

usage.cn: 我一直在关注你，用一切你知道或不知道的方式
usage.eng: I'm always keeping my eyes on you,by the means you know or not.
